onChange.script:
duration_old = self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value
	if duration_old != currentValue.value:
		#pass
#		system.perspective.print(str(duration_old)+' '+str(currentValue.value))
		self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value = currentValue.value

	if endsOn_old != currentValue.value:

transforms.code:
IsUpdate = self.params.IsUpdate
	if IsUpdate == True:
		eventId = self.params.event_id
		parameter = {'eventId':eventId}
		result = system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Detail/Get_Events_ByEventID',parameter)
		# get list of dateSelectionDays
		if result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionDays') != None and result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionDays') != '' and result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionDays') != 'None':
			dateSelectionDays = (result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionDays')).replace('[','')
			dateSelectionDays = dateSelectionDays.replace(']','')
			list = dateSelectionDays.split(',')
		else:
			list = []
		dateSelectionDays = []
		if len(list) > 0:
			for k in range(0,len(list)):
				day = list[k]
				if day != None and day != '':
					dateSelectionDays.append(int(day))
		# get list of facilitator
		if result.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId') != None and result.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId') != '' and result.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId') != 'None':
			facilitatorHumanIds = (result.getValueAt(0,'facilitatorHumanId')).replace('[','')
			facilitatorHumanIds = facilitatorHumanIds.replace(']','')
			list = facilitatorHumanIds.split(',')
		else:
			list = []
		facilitatorHumanIds = []
		if len(list) > 0:
			for k in range(0,len(list)):
				facilitatorHumanId = list[k]
				if facilitatorHumanId != None and facilitatorHumanId != '':
					facilitatorHumanIds.append(int(facilitatorHumanId))
					
		if result.getRowCount() > 0:
			if result.getValueAt(0,'timeRetired') != None:
				ParticipantActive = 0
			else:
				ParticipantActive = 1
			EventInfo ={
						'id':result.getValueAt(0,'id'),
						'categoryId':result.getValueAt(0,'categoryId'),
						'category':result.getValueAt(0,'category'),
						'name':result.getValueAt(0,'name'),
						'startsOn':result.getValueAt(0,'startsOn'),
						'endsOn':result.getValueAt(0,'endsOn'),
						'allDayEvent':result.getValueAt(0,'allDayEvent'),
						'description':result.getValueAt(0,'description'),
						'repeatFrequencyTypeId':result.getValueAt(0,'repeatFrequencyTypeId'),
						'dateSelectionPattern':result.getValueAt(0,'dateSelectionPattern'),
						'dateSelectionDays':dateSelectionDays,
						'weekdays':dateSelectionDays,
						'timeCreated':result.getValueAt(0,'timeCreated'),
						'timeRetired':result.getValueAt(0,'timeRetired'),
						'points':result.getValueAt(0,'points'),
						'facilitatorEmployeeId':facilitatorHumanIds,
						'IsEventRepeat':result.getValueAt(0,'IsEventRepeat'),
						'repeatDateUntil':result.getValueAt(0,'repeatDateUntil')
						,'scheduledWeekdays':result.getValueAt(0,'scheduledWeekdays')
						,'duration_hours':result.getValueAt(0,'duration_hours')
						,'locationId':result.getValueAt(0,'locationId')
						,'ParticipantActive':ParticipantActive
						}
#			# set week days 
#			self.custom.weekdays = dateSelectionDays
			# add locations
#			dataset = system.db.runNamedQuery("Event/ParticipantEvents/Detail/Get_SelectedLocations_ForEvent",{'EventId':self.params.event_id})
#			locations = []
#			if dataset.getRowCount() > 0:
#				for i in range(0,dataset.getRowCount()):
#					location = dataset.getValueAt(i,'locationId')
#					locations.append(location)
#			self.custom.Locations = locations
		else:
			EventInfo ={
						'id':None,
						'categoryId':None,
						'category':None,
						'name':None,
						'startsOn':system.date.now(),
						'endsOn': system.date.addDays(system.date.now(), 1),
						'allDayEvent':None,
						'description':'',
						'repeateFrequencyTypeId':None,
						'dateSelectionPattern':None,
						'dateSelectionDays':[],
						'weekdays':[],
						'timeCreated':None,
						'timeRetired':None,
						'points':None,
						'facilitatorEmployeeId':None,
						'IsEventRepeat':None,
						'repeatDateUntil':None
						,'scheduledWeekdays':None
						,'duration_hours':1
						,'locationId':None
						,'ParticipantActive':None
						}
#			self.custom.Locations = []
#			# set week days 
#			self.custom.weekdays = []
	else:
		EventInfo ={
					'id':None,
					'categoryId':None,
					'category':None,
					'name':None,
					'startsOn':system.date.now(),
					'endsOn': system.date.addDays(system.date.now(), 1),
					'allDayEvent':None,
					'description':'',
					'repeateFrequencyTypeId':None,
					'dateSelectionPattern':None,
					'dateSelectionDays':[],
					'weekdays':[],
					'timeCreated':None,
					'timeRetired':None,
					'points':None,
					'facilitatorEmployeeId':None,
					'IsEventRepeat':None,
					'repeatDateUntil':None
					,'scheduledWeekdays':None
					,'duration_hours':1
					,'locationId':None
					,'ParticipantActive':None
					}
#		self.custom.Locations = []
#		# set week days 
#		self.custom.weekdays = []
	return EventInfo

onChange.script: self.refreshBinding('custom.weekdays')

transforms.code:
schedule = value
	return schedule
#	prevSchedule = self.custom.PrevSchedule
#	NewHostDays = []
#	for day in schedule:
#		if day not in prevSchedule:
#			NewHostDays.append(day)
#	return NewHostDays

dataset = value
	schedule = []
	duration = 0
	if dataset.getRowCount() > 0:
		for i in range(0,dataset.getRowCount()):
			startDate = dataset.getValueAt(i,'startsOn')
			endDate = dataset.getValueAt(i,'endsOn')
			###
			dayOfYear = system.date.getDayOfYear(startDate)
			if dayOfYear not in schedule:
				schedule.append(dayOfYear)
			###
			duration = system.date.daysBetween(startDate, endDate)
#			while startDate < endDate:
#				dayOfYear = system.date.getDayOfYear(startDate)
#				if dayOfYear not in schedule:
#					schedule.append(dayOfYear)
#				startDate = system.date.addDays(startDate, 1)
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.duration = duration
	return schedule

if value is not None:
		if value == 1: ## weekly
			return 0 
		elif value == 2: ## bi weekly
			return 1
		elif value in [3,4,5,6,7]: ## monthly
			return 2
		else:
			return 3 ## specific dates
	else:
		return 3	# specific dates

dataset = value
	schedule = []
	duration = 0
	if dataset.getRowCount() > 0:
		for i in range(0,dataset.getRowCount()):
			startDate = dataset.getValueAt(i,'startsOn')
			endDate = dataset.getValueAt(i,'endsOn')
			###
			dayOfYear = system.date.getDayOfYear(startDate)
			if dayOfYear not in schedule:
				schedule.append(dayOfYear)
			###
			duration = system.date.daysBetween(startDate, endDate)
#			while startDate < endDate:
#				dayOfYear = system.date.getDayOfYear(startDate)
#				if dayOfYear not in schedule:
#					schedule.append(dayOfYear)
#				startDate = system.date.addDays(startDate, 1)
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.duration = duration
	return schedule

onChange.script:
self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Weeknights").getChild("Sun").refreshBinding('props.selected')
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Weeknights").getChild("Mon").refreshBinding('props.selected')
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Weeknights").getChild("Tue").refreshBinding('props.selected')
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Weeknights").getChild("Wed").refreshBinding('props.selected')
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Weeknights").getChild("Thur").refreshBinding('props.selected')
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Weeknights").getChild("Fri").refreshBinding('props.selected')
	self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Weeknights").getChild("Sat").refreshBinding('props.selected')

self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.startDate = currentValue.value
	duration = self.parent.parent.getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value
	endsOn = system.date.addHours(currentValue.value, int(duration))
	self.parent.parent.getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date = endsOn
	# if value change then remove prev value from schedule
	scheduleToRemove = system.date.getDayOfYear(previousValue.value) 
	scheduleToAdd = system.date.getDayOfYear(currentValue.value)
	if scheduleToRemove in (self.view.custom.schedule):
		(self.view.custom.schedule).remove(scheduleToRemove)
	if scheduleToAdd not in (self.view.custom.schedule):
		(self.view.custom.schedule).append(scheduleToAdd)

if self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("EndDate").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date == None:
		self.view.custom.endDateCalender = currentValue.value
#	endDate_old = self.view.custom.EventData.endsOn
#	if endDate_old != currentValue.value:
#		self.view.custom.EventData.endsOn = currentValue.value

#	duration = system.date.hoursBetween(StartsOn,EndsOn)
#	if duration_old != duration:
#		self.parent.parent.getChild("Duration_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value = duration

duration_old = self.view.custom.EventData.duration_hours
	if duration_old != currentValue.value:
		self.view.custom.EventData.duration_hours = currentValue.value
#	startsOn = self.parent.parent.getChild("StartsOn_Flex").getChild("Starts_On").props.params.date
#	endsOn = self.parent.parent.getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date

#	if endsOn != newDate:
#		self.parent.parent.getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date = newDate

#	self.view.custom.weekdays = []
	if currentValue.value != -1:
		self.view.refreshBinding('custom.calendarFiller')

#		self.view.custom.EventData.weekdays = []

messageHandlers.script:
self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("EventName_Flex").getChild("EventName").props.params.inputText = ''
#	if self.view.params.IsUpdate == False:
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("StartsOn_Flex").getChild("Starts_On").props.params.date = system.date.now()
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date = system.date.addDays(system.date.now(), 1)
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("EndDate").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date = system.date.addDays(system.date.now(), 1)
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("Category_Flex").getChild("Category").props.params.SelectedValue = -1
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("Location_Flex").getChild("Location").props.params.SelectedValue = -1
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("Points_Flex").getChild("Points").props.params.value = 0
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("Description_Flex").getChild("description").props.params.inputText = ''
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("AllDay_Flex").getChild("AllDay_checkbox").props.params.checked = False

# implement your handler here
	import traceback
	import datetime
	try:
		#Get input values
		eventName = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("EventName_Flex").getChild("EventName").props.params.inputText
		startsOn = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("StartsOn_Flex").getChild("Starts_On").props.params.date
		durationHours = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value
		endsOn = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date
		categoryId = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("Category_Flex").getChild("Category").props.params.SelectedValue
		locationId = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("Location_Flex").getChild("Location").props.params.SelectedValue
		scheduledWeekdays = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.nights
#		locations = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Row5").getChild("Location").props.params.selection
		points = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("Points_Flex").getChild("Points").props.params.value
		description = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("Description_Flex").getChild("description").props.params.inputText
		all_day = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("AllDay_Flex").getChild("AllDay_checkbox").props.params.checked
		timeCreated = system.date.format(system.date.now(),'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')
		ActiveParticipant = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("EventActive_Flex").getChild("EventActive").props.params.SelectedValue
		if ActiveParticipant == 0:
			timeRetired	= system.date.format(system.date.now(),'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')
		else:
			timeRetired = None
		Is_Update = self.view.params.IsUpdate
		repeatFrequencyTypeId = self.view.custom.RepeatFrequencyTypeId
		dateSelectionPattern = self.view.custom.pattern
		dateSelectionDays = self.view.custom.EventData.weekdays #self.view.custom.weekdays
		if dateSelectionDays != None and len(dateSelectionDays)>0:
			dateSelectionDays_Str = '[' + ','.join([str(elem) for elem in dateSelectionDays]) + ']'
		else:
			dateSelectionDays_Str = ''
		facilitatorEmployeeId = -1
		facilitatorEmployeeId_list = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("Facilitator_Flex").getChild("facilitator").props.params.selection
		IsEventRepeat = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("EventRepeats_Flex").getChild("EventRepeats_checkbox").props.params.checked
		repeatDateUntil = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("EndDate").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date
		if repeatDateUntil!=None and repeatDateUntil!='':
			repeatDateUntil = str(system.date.format(repeatDateUntil,'yyyy-MM-dd')) + ' 00:00:00'
		NewHostDays = self.view.custom.schedule #self.view.custom.NewHostDays
		#CanceledHostDays = self.parent.parent.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.CanceledSchedule
		startYear = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.StartYear
		endYear = self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.EndYear
		
		# Check if compulsory fields are not None
		if eventName == None or eventName == '':
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please fill in the Event Name before saving."
		elif startsOn == None or startsOn == '':
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select Stars-On Date before saving."
		elif endsOn == None or endsOn == '':
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select Ends-On Date before saving."
		elif categoryId == None or categoryId == '' or categoryId < 0:
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select Category before saving."
		elif locationId == None or locationId == '' or locationId < 0:
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select Loacation before saving."
#		elif locations == None or locations == '' or len(locations)<1:
#			valid = False
#			error_message = "Please select Loacation before saving."
		else:
			valid = True
			
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			if all_day == True:
				all_day = 1
				duration =  system.date.daysBetween(startsOn,endsOn) # diff between startsOn and EndsOn
				startsOn_Old = startsOn
				endsOn_Old = endsOn
				startsOn_time = '00:00:00'
				endsOn_time = '23:59:59'
				startsOn = str(system.date.format(startsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd')) + ' 00:00:00'
				endsOn = str(system.date.format(endsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd')) + ' 23:59:59'
			else:
				all_day = 0
				duration = system.date.daysBetween(startsOn,endsOn) # diff between startsOn and EndsOn
				startsOn_Old = startsOn
				endsOn_Old = endsOn
				startsOn_time = system.date.format(startsOn,'HH:mm:ss')
				endsOn_time = system.date.format(endsOn,'HH:mm:ss')
				startsOn = system.date.format(startsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
				endsOn = system.date.format(endsOn,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
			### Create transaction
			transactionFailed = False
			success = False
			human_id = None
			txId = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=5000)
			try:
				if Is_Update == False:
					# insert new event in participant.Event table
					parameter = {
								'categoryId':categoryId,
								'eventName':eventName,
								'startsOn':startsOn,
								'endsOn':endsOn,
								'all_day':all_day,
								'description':description,
								'points':points,
								'timeCreated': timeCreated,
								'repeatFrequencyTypeId':repeatFrequencyTypeId,
								'dateSelectionPattern' : dateSelectionPattern,
								'dateSelectionDays' : str(dateSelectionDays_Str),
								'facilitatorEmployeeId' : facilitatorEmployeeId,
								'IsEventRepeat' : IsEventRepeat,
								'repeatDateUntil' : repeatDateUntil,
								'scheduledWeekdays': scheduledWeekdays,
								'duration_hours': durationHours,
								'locationId': locationId,
								'timeRetired': timeRetired
								}
					system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_NewEvent',parameter)
					# get eventId of last added event
					query = "select max(id) from [participant].[Events]"
					result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
					eventId = result.getValueAt(0,0)
				else:
					eventId = self.view.params.event_id
					# update schedule event in participant.EventSchedule table
					result = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT startsOn,endsOn FROM participant.Events where id = "+str(eventId))
					event_startDate = result.getValueAt(0,0)
					event_endDate = result.getValueAt(0,1)
					if event_startDate != startsOn or event_endDate != endsOn:
						query = "select startsOn,endsOn,id from [participant].[EventSchedule] where timeRetired IS NULL and eventId =" + str(eventId)
						result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
	#						startsOn_New = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(startsOn), system.date.getMonth(startsOn), system.date.getDayOfMonth(startsOn))
	#						endsOn_New = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(endsOn), system.date.getMonth(endsOn), system.date.getDayOfMonth(endsOn))
						attendedDates = ''
						for k in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
							startDate_sql = result.getValueAt(k,0)
							endDate_sql = result.getValueAt(k,1)
							id = result.getValueAt(k,2)
							if startDate_sql == event_startDate and endDate_sql == event_endDate:
								parameter = {
									'eventId':eventId,
									'startsOn':startDate_sql,
									'endsOn':endDate_sql,
									'startsOn_New':startsOn,
									'endsOn_New':endsOn,
									}
								system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_ScheduledEventDates',parameter)
							
							elif (startDate_sql < startsOn_Old or endDate_sql < startsOn_Old) and (startDate_sql != event_startDate and endDate_sql != event_endDate):
	#								checkEventAttended = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT * FROM participant.EventAttendance where scheduleID = " + str(id))
	#								if checkEventAttended.getRowCount() > 0:
	#									attendedDates = attendedDates + str(system.date.format(startDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy')) + ',' #system.perspective.openPopup("EventScheduleDelete_Warning",'Events/ParticipantEvents/Templates/EventScheduleDelete_Warning', params = {'date':system.date.format(startDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy')}, showCloseIcon = False, resizable = False, draggable = False, overlayDismiss = True, modal  = True)
	#								else:
	#									parameter = {
	#												'eventId':eventId,
	#												'startsOn':startDate_sql,
	#												'endsOn':endDate_sql
	#												}
	#									system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_ScheduledEvent',parameter)
	#									system.perspective.print('delete 1')
								pass
							else:
								date = startDate_sql
								start_date = str(system.date.format(date,'yyyy-MM-dd ')) + str(startsOn_time)
								end_date =  str(system.date.format(system.date.addDays(date, duration),'yyyy-MM-dd ')) + str(endsOn_time)
								parameter = {
									'eventId':eventId,
									'startsOn':startDate_sql,
									'endsOn':endDate_sql,
									'startsOn_New':start_date,
									'endsOn_New':end_date,
									}
								system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_ScheduledEventDates',parameter)							
					# update event in participant.Event table
	#					system.perspective.print('dateSelectionDays: '+str(dateSelectionDays_Str))
					parameter = {
								'eventId':eventId,
								'categoryId':categoryId,
								'eventName':eventName,
								'startsOn':startsOn,
								'endsOn':endsOn,
								'all_day':all_day,
								'description':description,
								'points':points,
								'repeatFrequencyTypeId':repeatFrequencyTypeId,
								'dateSelectionPattern' : dateSelectionPattern,
								'dateSelectionDays' : str(dateSelectionDays_Str),
								'facilitatorEmployeeId' : facilitatorEmployeeId,
								'IsEventRepeat' : IsEventRepeat,
								'repeatDateUntil' : repeatDateUntil,
								'scheduledWeekdays': scheduledWeekdays,
								'duration_hours': durationHours,
								'locationId': locationId,
								'timeRetired' : timeRetired
								}
					system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_Event',parameter)				
				# Schedule
				##NewHostDays startYear endYear
	#				system.perspective.print('Duration: ' + str(duration))
				host_days_list = []
				for days in NewHostDays:
					days = int(days)
					if days < 182:
						year = int(endYear)
					else:
						year = int(startYear)
					system.perspective.print(str(days)+str(year))
					date = datetime.datetime(year, 1, 1) + datetime.timedelta(days - 1)
					month = date.month
	#					if month == 1:
	#						month = 12
	#					else:
					month = month - 1
					date = system.date.getDate(year, month, date.day)
					start_date = str(system.date.format(date,'yyyy-MM-dd ')) + str(startsOn_time)
					end_date =  str(system.date.format(system.date.addDays(date, duration),'yyyy-MM-dd ')) + str(endsOn_time)
					host_days_list.append((start_date,end_date))
				#if Is_Update == False:
				host_days_list.append((startsOn,endsOn))
									
	#				system.perspective.print('host_days_list: ' + str(host_days_list))
				#check schedule exist if not then insert
				query = "select startsOn,endsOn,id from [participant].[EventSchedule] where timeRetired IS NULL and eventId =" + str(eventId)
				result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
				# if  IsEventRepeat = True then insert/remove events for selected evntId, else set timeretired
				if IsEventRepeat == True:
					#insert new schedule
					for i in range(0,len(host_days_list)):
						startDate = host_days_list[i][0]
						endDate = host_days_list[i][1]
						Found = False
						system.perspective.print('Error: '+str(startDate)+' '+str(endDate))
						if result.getRowCount() > 0:
							for j in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
								startDate_sql = system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,0),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
								endDate_sql =  system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,1),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
								if (str(startDate) == str(startDate_sql) and str(endDate) == str(endDate_sql)):
									Found = True
						# check if date from hostlist in sql or it is event StartsOn/EndsOn date or Is back date
						if (startDate < system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') or endDate < system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) or (str(system.date.format(event_startDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) == str(startDate.split(' ')[0]) and str(system.date.format(event_endDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) == str(endDate.split(' ')[0])):
							Found = True
						if Found == False:
							# insert record for scheduled event in EventScheduled table
							parameter = {
										'eventId':eventId,
										'startsOn':startDate,
										'endsOn':endDate,
										'notes':'',
										'timeCreated':timeCreated,
										'duration':durationHours,
										'locationId':locationId,
										'points':points,
										'description':description
										}
							system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_ScheduledEvent',parameter)	
					#delete cancelled schedule	
					if result.getRowCount() > 0:
						for j in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
							startDate_sql = system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,0),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
							endDate_sql =  system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,1),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
							id = result.getValueAt(j,2)
							Found = False
							for i in range(0,len(host_days_list)):
								startDate = host_days_list[i][0]
								endDate = host_days_list[i][1]
								if (str(startDate) == str(startDate_sql) and str(endDate) == str(endDate_sql)) or (startDate_sql == event_startDate and endDate_sql == event_endDate) or (startDate < system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') or endDate < system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')):
									Found = True
							if Found == False:
								# cancel record for scheduled event in EventScheduled table only if it didn't have attendance
								checkEventAttended = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT * FROM participant.EventAttendance where scheduleID = " + str(id))
								if checkEventAttended.getRowCount() > 0:
									pass #attendedDates = attendedDates + str(system.date.format(startDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy')) + ',' #system.perspective.openPopup("EventScheduleDelete_Warning",'Events/ParticipantEvents/Templates/EventScheduleDelete_Warning', params = {'date':system.date.format(startDate_sql,'dd/MM/yyyy')}, showCloseIcon = False, resizable = False, draggable = False, overlayDismiss = True, modal  = True)
								else:
									parameter = {
												'eventId':eventId,
												'startsOn':startDate_sql,
												'endsOn':endDate_sql
												}
									system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_ScheduledEvent',parameter)	
									system.perspective.print('Delete2')
				else: # if repeate Event checkbox not selected
					#insert schedule for new event startdate and update if enddate change
					for i in range(0,len(host_days_list)):
						startDate = host_days_list[i][0]
						endDate = host_days_list[i][1]
						query = "select startsOn,endsOn,id from [participant].[EventSchedule] where timeRetired IS NULL and eventId =" + str(eventId)
						result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query)
						Found = False
						if result.getRowCount() > 0:
							for j in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
								startDate_sql = system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,0),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
								endDate_sql =  system.date.format(result.getValueAt(j,1),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')
								if str(startDate) == str(startDate_sql) and str(endDate) == str(endDate_sql):
									Found = True
						if Found == False:
							# insert record for scheduled event in EventScheduled table
							parameter = {
										'eventId':eventId,
										'startsOn':startDate,
										'endsOn':endDate,
										'notes':'',
										'timeCreated':timeCreated,
										'duration':durationHours,
										'locationId':locationId,
										'points':points,
										'description':description
										}
							system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_ScheduledEvent',parameter)	
							system.perspective.print('Insert')
						else:
							#update date 
							parameter = {
								'eventId':eventId,
								'startsOn':startDate_sql,
								'endsOn':endDate_sql,
								'startsOn_New':startDate,
								'endsOn_New':endDate,
								}
							system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_ScheduledEventDates',parameter)
					# delete records if uncheck repeat event checkbox						
					if result.getRowCount() > 0:
						for j in range(0,result.getRowCount()):
							startDate_sql = result.getValueAt(j,0)
							endDate_sql =  result.getValueAt(j,1)
							
							if (startDate_sql != event_startDate and endDate_sql != event_endDate) and (system.date.format(startDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') != system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') or system.date.format(endDate_sql,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') != system.date.format(endsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')):
								# cancel record for scheduled event in EventScheduled table
								parameter = {
											'eventId':eventId,
											'startsOn':startDate_sql,
											'endsOn':endDate_sql
											}
								system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_ScheduledEvent',parameter)
								system.perspective.print('Delete3')
								system.perspective.print(str(startDate_sql)+ ' '+ str(startsOn_Old)+ ' ' + str(endDate_sql)+ ' ' + str(startsOn_Old))
								
				# Get all schedule instances and update duration/location/points/description for each instance in EventScheduled table 
				limitDate = system.date.format(startsOn_Old,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')
				parameter = {
							'duration':durationHours,
							'locationId':locationId,
							'points':points,
							'description':description,
							'eventId' :eventId,
							'limitDate' :limitDate
							}
				system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Update_ScheduledEvent',parameter)	 
				
				# delete old records and insert new records to set facilitator for each schedule
				parameter = {
							'eventId':eventId
							}
				system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Delete_AllScheduleFacilitator',parameter)	 	
				for facilitator in facilitatorEmployeeId_list:
					parameter = {
								'eventId':eventId,
								'facilitatorHumanId':facilitator
								}
					system.db.runNamedQuery('Event/ParticipantEvents/Registration/Insert_AllScheduleFacilitator',parameter)	 		
				
			#Transaction failure :(
			except:
				transactionFailed = True
				logger = system.util.getLogger("Events RegisterEvent Button Save")
				msg = traceback.format_exc()
				logger.error(msg)
				
			### Check if an error occured rollback the transaction
			if transactionFailed:
				system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId)
				payload = {'message':"Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again."}
				system.perspective.sendMessage("showError", payload=payload, scope="view")
			### Otherwise commit 
			else:
				#Success!!!!
				system.db.commitTransaction(txId)
				if attendedDates != '':
					message = "Event updated Successfully.\n *(Can't delete date(s) [" + str(attendedDates[:-1]) + '] as participants attended event for these dates.'
				else:
					message = "Event updated Successfully."
				payload = {'message':message}
				system.perspective.sendMessage("showError", payload=payload, scope="view")
				success = True
			### Always close the transaction	
			system.db.closeTransaction(txId)
			# If successful reset and close the dock
			if success:
				# refresh overview table
				system.perspective.sendMessage("refreshPersonalInformation", payload=payload, scope="session")
				
		
		else:
			payload = {'message':error_message}
			system.perspective.sendMessage("showError", payload=payload, scope="view")
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Events Register Event Save Button")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

# implement your handler here
	self.view.params.event_name = ''
	eventName = self.view.custom.EventData.name
	endDate = self.view.custom.EventData.endsOn
	duration = self.view.custom.EventData.duration_hours
	self.view.params.event_name = eventName
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Ends_On").props.params.date = endDate
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Left_Flex").getChild("EndsOn_Flex").getChild("Duration").props.params.value = duration
	self.getChild("FlexContainer").getChild("Right_Flex").getChild("Schedule_Flex").getChild("Calendar").getChild("Table").props.params.daysHosting = self.view.custom.PrevSchedule
